title: New Devices
leadParagraph1: Evergreen Wireless partners with select Original Device Manufacturers (ODM) partners to bring Canadians premium quality entry and mid-range level devices.
leadParagraph2: Our portfolio of new devices includes Phones, Tablets, Wireless Broadband, IoT, Wearables, and Trackers.
leadparagraph3: In addition to wholesale devices, Evergreen Wireless also provides retail-ready solutions. Our Connected Prepaid Bundles offer simplicity and value:
leadparagraph4: LTE SKY Smartphone with a pre-activated Koodo SIM Card – Instantly ready to go with a full prepaid plan for 30 days.
leadparagraph5: LTE SKY Smartphone with a Koodo Prepaid SIM Card – Everything you need to get connected.
leadpaaragraph6: These Evergreen Wireless Prepaid Bundles can be purchased at your favourite retailer, or directly from our website using the buttons below:
